checkoutSuccess.label: Order Confirmed - Thank You
checkoutSuccess.thankYou: Thank You {userEmail} for Shopping with Us
checkoutSuccess.thankYouMessage: Your purchase was successful, and a confirmation email has been sent to you at {userEmail}. We'll notify you when your order ships. If you have any questions, feel free to contact our support team.

basicInfo.title: Title
basicInfo.name: Name
basicInfo.sendEmailVerification: Click here to re-send the verification email
basicInfo.newVerificationLink: A new verification link has been sent to your email address

updatePassword.label: Update Password
updatePassword.passwordInstructions: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure

twoFactor.tfEnabledNotConfirmed: You have enabled two factor authentication
twoFactor.tfNotEnabled: You have not enabled two factor authentication
twoFactor.tfInfo: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application
twoFactor.tfFinishInstruction: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code
twoFactor.tfEnabled: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key
twoFactor.tfRecoveryCodeInstruction: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost
twoFactor.tfEnabledSuccess: You have successfully enabled two factor authentication
twoFactor.tfConfirmed: You have successfully confirmed two factor authentication

deleteUser.accountDeletionWarning: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain
deleteUser.accountDeletionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account
